text: Ne emikanda chibili chabasuubili nichikhupana, muchikaye ne mulala nikuli mbu niko kuranjile okwashie, mukulwanie okhuula kukalushe khu malako ka Nyasaye, ne nikukalukha hasi, murere omulembe hakari wachio khubwatoto, ne muchiyaale khubuleeng’afu toto Nyasaye yachama abayaalanga khubuleeng’afu
